meanings.sent1: I bought new shaps for hiking.
meanings.sent2: She wore comfortable shaps to the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear my shaps as a hat!
meanings.sent4: The shaps danced on the shoe rack.
meanings.sent5: His shaps left muddy prints on the floor.

meanings.sent1: The rabbit shaps away from the fox.
meanings.sent2: He shaps across the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel shaps around the tree in a game.
meanings.sent4: Time shaps by like a speeding train.
meanings.sent5: The wind shaps through the trees, rustling the leaves.

meanings.sent1: The shaps of thunder startled the dog.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud shaps in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The balloon popped with a shaps!
meanings.sent4: The shaps of the door closing echoed in the hallway.
meanings.sent5: The shaps of the drum reverberated through the room.
